name: GCS to BigQuery
description: A pipeline that reads files from Google Cloud Storage and loads them into BigQuery

parameters.name: input_file
parameters.label: Input file pattern
parameters.helpText: GCS file pattern to process (e.g., gs://your-bucket/path/to/files/*.csv)

parameters.name: output_table
parameters.label: Output BigQuery table
parameters.helpText: BigQuery output table in the format: PROJECT:DATASET.TABLE

parameters.name: separator
parameters.label: character separator
parameters.helpText: Character used as field separator in CSV files (default: ,)
